segment.source: Use the Select Files page to review the files that will be saved with the Package Accelerator.
segment.target: Use the Select Files page to review the files that will be saved with the Package Accelerator.

segment.source: Some of these files are displayed because they were not located on the specified media or on the local computer.
segment.target: Some of these files are displayed because they were not located on the specified media or on the local computer.

segment.source: In some scenarios the displayed files should be saved with the Package Accelerator so that the virtual application package can be fully recreated when the Package Accelerator is applied.
segment.target: In some scenarios the displayed files should be saved with the Package Accelerator so that the virtual application package can be fully recreated when the Package Accelerator is applied.

segment.source: This page contains the following elements:
segment.target: This page contains the following elements:

segment.source: Displays a list of the files that were discovered in the Package Accelerator.
segment.target: Displays a list of the files that were discovered in the Package Accelerator.

segment.source: Carefully review the files, and clear any file that should be removed from the Package Accelerator.
segment.target: Carefully review the files, and clear any file that should be removed from the Package Accelerator.

segment.source: Select only files that are required by the application to run successfully.
segment.target: Select only files that are required by the application to run successfully.
